title: A bill to direct the Assistant to the President for Homeland Security to establish the National Energy Infrastructure Security Program.
content: National Energy Infrastructure Security Program Establishment Act - Directs the Assistant to the President for Homeland Security to establish the National Energy Infrastructure Security Program, which shall provide funds to States to implement approved State plans to provide security against threats to critical energy infrastructure facilities. Establishes the National Energy Infrastructure Security Trust Fund, and appropriates to it 50 percent of qualified Outer Continental Shelf revenues.
